actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide for municipal use of storage water in Benbrook Dam, Texas.

summary.text: Amends a specified Act to provide for municipal use of storage water in Benbrook Dam, Texas, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to contract with specified local governments for the use of water supply storage in the Benbrook Reservoir.

titles.title: A bill to provide for municipal use of storage water in Benbrook Dam, Texas.
